author: rse
msg: subst tabs with spaces to be consistent with coding style in this part

author: dgaudet
msg: Defensive coding -- protect against a possible future where while just_die()
is in effect something might be muddling in alloc.c's internal structure,
and one of the child_exit handlers may want to muddle there too.

author: dgaudet
msg: Combine large bwrite() with partial buffer by using writev() to avoid any
mem->mem copies.  Fix a bug where if bflush/bwrite had a write failure
while chunking they won't properly start the next chunk.
